mapper.select:
select goodsNo, goodsNm, makerNm, originNm, goodsModelNo, makeYmd, totalStock, fixedPrice, goodsPrice, regDt, modDt, cateCode, gdsThumbImg, imagePath
FROM Product order by goodsNo desc limit #{startRow}, #{pageSize}

WITH recursive cte AS ( SELECT cateName, cateCode, cateCodeRef, 1 AS level FROM goods_category WHERE cateCodeRef IS null UNION all SELECT p.cateName, p.cateCode, p.cateCodeRef, 1 + LEVEL AS level FROM goods_category p INNER JOIN cte ON p.cateCodeRef = cte.cateCode ) SELECT cateName, cateCode, cateCodeRef, LEVEL FROM cte;
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO product ( goodsNm, makerNm, originNm, goodsModelNo, makeYmd, totalStock, fixedPrice, goodsPrice, regDt, modDt, cateCode, goodsMustInfo, gdsThumbImg, imagePath ) VALUES ( #{goodsNm}, #{makerNm}, #{originNm}, #{goodsModelNo}, #{makeYmd}, #{totalStock}, #{fixedPrice}, #{goodsPrice}, #{regDt}, #{modDt}, #{cateCode}, #{goodsMustInfo}, #{gdsThumbImg}, #{imagePath}
)
mapper.select: select p.goodsNo, p.goodsNm, c.cateCode, c.cateName, c.cateCodeRef, makerNm, originNm, goodsModelNo, makeYmd, totalStock, fixedPrice, goodsPrice, regDt, modDt, p.cateCode, goodsMustInfo, gdsThumbImg, imagePath from product p INNER JOIN goods_category c ON p.cateCode = c.cateCode WHERE p.goodsNo =#{goodsNo}
mapper.update: UPDATE product set goodsNm =#{goodsNm}, makerNm =#{makerNm}, originNm=#{originNm}, goodsModelNo =#{goodsModelNo}, makeYmd =#{makeYmd}, totalStock =#{totalStock}, fixedPrice =#{fixedPrice}, goodsPrice = #{goodsPrice}, modDt =#{modDt}, cateCode =#{cateCode}, goodsMustInfo =#{goodsMustInfo} WHERE goodsNo =${goodsNo}
